item.title: Mike add a quote by Hunter S. Thompson
item.description: "No sympathy for the devil; keep that in mind. Buy the ticket, take the ride...and if it occasionally gets a little heavier than what you had in mind, well...maybe chalk it off to forced conscious expansion: Tune in, freak out, get beaten." -- Hunter S. Thompson

item.title: Mike add a quote by Jack London
item.description: "And how have I lived? Frankly and openly, though crudely. I have not been afraid of life. I have not shrunk from it. I have taken it for what it was at its own valuation. And I have not been ashamed of it. Just as it was, it was mine." -- Jack London

item.title: Mike add a quote by Martin Amis
item.description: "Perhaps there are other bits of my life that would take on content, take on shadow, if only I read more and thought less about money." -- Martin Amis

item.title: Mike add a quote by Jean Paul Sarte
item.description: "It is only in our decisions that we are important." -- Jean Paul Sarte

item.title: Mike add a quote by H.G. Wells
item.description: "If you fell down yesterday, stand up today." -- H.G. Wells
